price: Dájúdájú Allāhu ṣẹ́bi lé àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́. Ó sì pèsè Iná tó ń jó sílẹ̀ dè wọ́n.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ سَعِيرًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha laʿana al-kāfirīna wa-aʿadda lahum saʿīran
